quote: Let us at least say of religion that it means that every part of the body is infused with mind, not that the mind is overwhelmed and drowned in body. For the principal attribute of the Gods, without or within us, is mind.
author: Thornton Wilder,  The Ides of March

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: The body is the outermost layer of the mind.
author: David Mitchell,  number9dream

quote: It is with the soul that we grasp the essence of another human being, not with the mind, nor even with the heart.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Mind led bodyto the edge of the precipice.They stared in desireat the naked abyss.If you love me, said mind,take that step into silence.If you love me, said body,turn and exist.
author: Anne Stevenson

quote: Man has no Body distinct from his soul; for that called Body is a portion of a Soul discerned by the five senses, the chief inlets of Soul in this age.
author: William Blake

quote: My mind is an instrument of peaceI am the peaceMy heart sing the song of peaceMy mind dances with peaceI laugh with peaceMy soul is longing for peaceMy spirit is the source of peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A soul gives power to the mind; and the mind empowers the soul
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: Nakamura Tempu Sensei viewed the mind as a segment of the body that could not be seen and the body as the element of the mind that was observable. He also likened the mind and body to a stream, with the mind as the source flowing down to the body. Whatever we drop in the stream will be carried down by the current. In like manner, our thoughts will influence the body and our well being.
author: H.E. Davey

quote: The mind is a metaphor of the world of objects.
author: Pierre Bourdieu

quote: I'm not a body with a soul, I'm a soul that has a visible part called the body.
author: Paulo Coelho,  Eleven Minutes

quote: Mental strength induces mind and body.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Ye are Blood of my Blood, and Bone of my Bone,I give ye my Body, that we Two might be One.I give ye my Spirit, 'til our Life shall be Done.
author: Diana Gabaldon,  Outlander

quote: Having a body is in itself the greatest threat to the mind... The body encloses the mind in a fortress; before long the mind is besieged on all sides, and in the end the mind has to give itself up.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: The mind's first step to self-awareness must be through the body.
author: George Sheehan

quote: The soul is the weariest part of the body.
author: Paul Bowles,  The Sheltering Sky

quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
author: Aristotle,  The Philosophy of Aristotle

quote: You are my heart as it beats within my chest, my soul as it moves through my mind. The breath in my body that so fascinates you is your essence pouring in and out of me in a wave that drowns me over and over again until I cannot breathe for wanting you. Needing you.
author: Jacquelyn Frank,  Elijah

quote: Body and spirit, I surrendered whole, To harsh Instructors- and received a soul.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: ...[M]y inner self moved; my spirit shook its always-fettered wings half loose. I had a sudden feeling as if I, who never yet truly lived, were at last about to taste life.
author: Charlotte Brontë,  Villette

quote: Soul inhabits body that fits.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Body is slave of mind. Mind is regulated by ideas, attitudes, beliefs and tendencies. What really matters is that which set of beliefs get most well entrenched in the mind of a person in the first few decades of his life so as to guide him for the rest of his life as he starts his journey from one end of life to another end of life.
author: Shri Nagesh,  BELIEFS & MORALS

quote: Unfathomable mind: now beacon, now sea.
author: Samuel Beckett,  Molloy, Malone Dies, The Unnamable

quote: ‎If heart filled with purity,then mind found the beauty.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: Two minds with but a single thought, two hearts that beat as one.
author: Jasper Fforde,  First Among Sequels

quote: Mind makes a man of God.
author: Emmanuel Diogu

quote: The mind is satisfied with phrased, but not the body, the body is more fastidious, it wants muscles. A body always tells the truth, that's why it's usually depressing and disgusting to look at.
author: Louis-Ferdinand Céline,  Journey to the End of the Night

quote: I am not my body. My body is nothing without me.
author: Tom Stoppard,  Rock 'n' Roll

quote: Ամբողջ մարմնի կենդանութիւնը հոգին է, իսկ մարմինն ու հոգին կառավարողը՝ միտքն է:The whole essence of the body is the spirit, while the governor of both spirit and body is the mind.
author: Saint Vardapet Eghishē

quote: Thoughts are as simple as the process…a message from the soul; conveyed through the heart; received in the mind
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: You've come to give me a piece of your mind. You know that phrase is really beautiful. The mind is the most powerful thing in the body. Whatever the mind believes, the body can achieve. So to give someone a piece of it... well thank you. Funny how people are always intent on giving it to the people they dislike when it really should be for the ones they love.
author: Cecelia Ahern,  If You Could See Me Now

quote: You don’t have a soul, Doctor. You are a soul. You have a body, temporarily.
author: Walter M. Miller Jr.,  A Canticle for Leibowitz

quote: Love with all your heart. And the rest of your body. Oh, and your mind, too.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: May my heart be kind, my mind fierce, and my spirit brave.
author: Kate Forsyth,  The Witches of Eileanan

quote: O the mind, mind has mountains; cliffs of fallFrightful, sheer, no-man-fathomed.
author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quote: Think of how you feel when you are sick, or how you felt when you were learning to ride your bike. The physical state of your body has a direct effect on how you think about the world, on the state of your mind. I don’t think it would be an exaggeration to say that your body has a direct effect on who you are. (30)In an essay by Eric Saidel, Sirius Black: Man or Dog
author: Gregory Bassham,  The Ultimate Harry Potter and Philosophy: Hogwarts for Muggles

quote: Trance & Instinct The best poems come from trance and instinct;transcribing the unedited voice of universal consciousness.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: To think what is true, to sense what is beautiful and to want what is good, hereby the spirit finds purpose of a life in reason.
author: Johann Gottfried Herder

quote: An active mind cannot exist in an inactive body.
author: George S. Patton Jr.

quote: My body is precious and not separate from my soul.
author: SARK,  Succulent Wild Woman

quote: Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world.
author: Amit Ray,  Mindfulness : Living in the Moment - Living in the Breath

quote: Beauty is the virtue of the body as virtue is the beauty of the soul
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: the body is wiser than its inhabitants. the body is the soul. the body is god’s messenger.
author: Erica Jong

quote: The mind can calculate, but the spirit yearns, and the heart knows what the heart knows
author: Stephen King

quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: The mind is just like a muscle - the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets and the more it can expand.
author: Idowu Koyenikan,  Wealth for All: Living a Life of Success at the Edge of Your Ability

quote: Smartass Disciple: Master, where will you go after your soul leaves your body?Master of Stupidity: What makes you think a soul will go elsewhere physically?
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: What does it matter where my body happens to be?' he said. 'My mind goes on working all the same.
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: Lend me your ears and you can borrow my mind
author: Benny Bellamacina,  The King of Rhyme

quote: With my ninth mind I resurrect my firstand dance slow to the music of my soul made new.
author: Aberjhani,  Visions of a Skylark Dressed in Black
